traits.name: Brute
traits.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the rager hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Created Race
traits.desc: The boarfolk rager has advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that would alter its form.

traits.name: Keen Scent
traits.desc: A boarfolk rager has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks based on scent.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the rager can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The boarfolk rager makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Tusks
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
